meaning_str.bing:
adj. 使用武器的；用武力的；携带武器的；持枪的
v. “arm”的过去式和过去分词
网络. 武装的；有扶手的；有……装备的

使用武器的；用武力的；携带武器的；持枪的
武装的；有扶手的；有……装备的

持枪的；武装的；持武器的；荷枪实弹的；装甲的；准备充分的
武装；装备；配备武器；准备发射；使（炸弹、导弹或其他爆炸装置）处于待发状态；（arm的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: Erdogan also defends Iran's right to a nuclear programme, panicking western diplomats who are trying to prevent a nuclear-armed Iran.
1.cn: 埃尔多安还为伊朗发展核计划的权利辩护，此举让试图阻止伊朗装备核武器的西方外交官感到恐慌。

2.en: He said the army troops had been "cut off the armed opposition in Tripoli last weekend scored the posterior. "
2.cn: 他说，政府军部队已经“截断了上周末攻入的黎波里反对派武装的后路”。

3.en: Even the streets leading up to its outer barriers were roamed by gorilla-faced guards in black uniforms, armed with jointed truncheons.
3.cn: 连通向爱心部外层关卡的街道都有大猩猩般粗壮的警卫巡逻把守，他们身穿黑制服，手持双节警棍。

0.en: It's fair to say that you're on the brink of armed conflict.
0.cn: 两国一直处在交战的边缘。

1.en: I didn't ask you what you think. You need to be armed, Claire.
1.cn: 我没问你的意见。你得有所准备，克莱尔。

2.en: Armed police, you're surrounded! Give it to me. Give it to me.
2.cn: “武装警察，你被包围了 ！”东西给我。给我！

3.en: Now the south has been subdued, and our forces are fully armed.

4.en: I'd like to aim for the chair of Armed Services or Homeland Security.
4.cn: 我想做众议院军事委员会主席，或者国土安全委员会主席。

5.en: President Johnson awarded 4 Medals of Honor to men from each of the armed services.
5.cn: 约翰逊总统给四名军人颁发了荣誉勋章。

6.en: His name's Ngoc Minh Quan. He's armed and has U.S. Special Forces training. Use extreme caution.
6.cn: 姓名关玉明。他持有枪械，接受过美国特种部队训练要格外当心。

7.en: What kind of beasts? They are saying giants. Armed giants. Wolves to carry them. Huge unstoppable monsters.
7.cn: 是哪种野兽？他们说个头很大，全副武装，他们还骑着狼，势不可挡的巨型怪物。

8.en: Last night I was strong armed into an evening of harp music and spooning with an emotional Amy Farrah Fowler.
8.cn: 昨一整晚，我被强迫听那烦人的竖琴，还得让情绪化的艾米·法拉·福勒熊抱。

9.en: So we don't want to look like we're shoving an armed unit of National Guards down Jim Matthews' throat, right?
9.cn: 我们不希望看起来像是把一支武装国民警卫队强加给了吉姆·马修斯，对吗？

10.en: There were armed men in the basement of the exchange, a massive firefight six stories underground. Sameen was shot.
10.cn: 交易所的地下室设有重兵，负六层一场激战，萨姆恩中弹。

11.en: Our intelligence suggests that Ramsey will be transported by an armed motorcade through the Caucasus mountain range.
11.cn: 我们的情报显示，拉姆齐会由一列武装车队护送，转移到高加索山脉。

12.en: The material is a blend of taffeta and high density body armor. Fully armed and loaded. And they glow. That's nuclear.
12.cn: 由高档材料制作而成有高密度的盔甲防护，藏着上膛的武器，还有发着光的核武器。

13.en: Confederados and the government like to call this thing a war, but they're fighting starving farmers armed with rocks.
13.cn: 南方军和政府称之为战争，但是他们的对手是拿石头当武器的饥饿的农民。

14.en: And when the world calls on America, we call on the brave men and women of our armed forces to do what no one else can.
14.cn: 当世界呼唤美国时，我们号召英勇的男女军人去做这些其他人无法完成的事情。

15.en: And in doing so, your class will be armed with more tools of influence and empowerment than any other generation in history.
15.cn: 届时，各位同学在影响力以及自主力方面都会如虎添翼，胜于以往的任何一代人。

16.en: Armed with the knowledge the guy from the football game was a jerk the first time you met him, you might expect more of the same down the road.
16.cn: 有了这种知识，足球比赛的那个家伙，你第一次遇见他，觉得他是个混蛋，你可能会觉得他以后也是个混蛋。

17.en: So I am issuing an executive order, by virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States and commander in chief of the armed forces.
17.cn: 我要下达一项行政命令，凭借我作为美国总统和三军总司令的的权力。

18.en: No one who fought in that war is still alive, but we remember their sacrifice and indeed the sacrifice of all those in the armed forces who serve and protect us today.
18.cn: 参加过那场战争的人已无人在世，但是我们仍掉念先人的牺牲，诚然也感念如今保家卫国的子弟兵们的牺牲。
